duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct risk assessments and develop security policies and processes.
Monitor security tools, manage system configurations, and perform incident detection and response.
Collaborate with other teams to develop, train, and monitor best security practices.
Implement vulnerability management and forensic processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, preferably in a technology-related field, or equivalent work experience. Security certification (CISSP, CISM, or similar)
